oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gay Street
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thompson Brothers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Gay Street looking north, Knoxville, TN. 1929. At left: B.W. Akers Co. 'Acres of Diamonds,' Nick's Quick Lunch, Tennessee Hat Works, Bond Bros., Economy Drugs. At right: Hotel Farragut, Tennessee Theatre, S & W Cafeteria, Banker's Trust Company (clock on sign). Cars parked on street.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Streets; Business enterprises; Automobiles;
